info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

delete.description: Deletes the specified authorization from the specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: authorizationName
parameters.description: The name of the authorization.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

200.description: Delete successful.

get.description: Gets the specified authorization from the specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: authorizationName
parameters.description: The name of the authorization.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the ExpressRouteCircuitAuthorization resource.

put.description: Creates or updates an authorization in the specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: authorizationName
parameters.description: The name of the authorization.

parameters.name: authorizationParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update express route circuit authorization operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitAuthorization resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitAuthorization resource.

get.description: Gets all authorizations in an express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the circuit.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of ExpressRouteCircuitAuthorization resources.

delete.description: Deletes the specified peering from the specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: peeringName
parameters.description: The name of the peering.

200.description: Delete successful.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets the specified authorization from the specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: peeringName
parameters.description: The name of the peering.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitPeering resource.

put.description: Creates or updates a peering in the specified express route circuits.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: peeringName
parameters.description: The name of the peering.

parameters.name: peeringParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update express route circuit peering operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitPeering resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitPeering resource.

get.description: Gets all peerings in a specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of ExpressRouteCircuitPeering resources.

delete.description: Deletes the specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

202.description: Accepted. Sets 'Disabling' provisioningState until the operation completes. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

200.description: Delete successful.

get.description: Gets information about the specified express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of express route circuit.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuit resource.

put.description: Creates or updates an express route circuit.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the circuit.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update express route circuit operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuit resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuit resource.

patch.description: Updates an express route circuit tags.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the circuit.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update express route circuit tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuit resource.

post.description: Gets the currently advertised ARP table associated with the express route circuit in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: peeringName
parameters.description: The name of the peering.

parameters.name: devicePath
parameters.description: The path of the device.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitsArpTable resource.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Gets the currently advertised routes table associated with the express route circuit in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: peeringName
parameters.description: The name of the peering.

parameters.name: devicePath
parameters.description: The path of the device.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitsRouteTable resource.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Gets the currently advertised routes table summary associated with the express route circuit in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: peeringName
parameters.description: The name of the peering.

parameters.name: devicePath
parameters.description: The path of the device.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitsRoutesTableSummary resource.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets all the stats from an express route circuit in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitStats resource.

get.description: Gets all stats from an express route circuit in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: circuitName
parameters.description: The name of the express route circuit.

parameters.name: peeringName
parameters.description: The name of the peering.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitStats resource.

get.description: Gets all the express route circuits in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ExpressRouteCircuitAuthorization resource.

get.description: Gets all the express route circuits in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of ExpressRouteCircuit resources.

get.description: Gets all the available express route service providers.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of ExpressRouteServiceProvider resources.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

name.description: Gets name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

value.description: The authorizations in an ExpressRoute Circuit.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

AuthorizationListResult.description: Response for ListAuthorizations API service call retrieves all authorizations that belongs to an ExpressRouteCircuit.

advertisedCommunities.description: The communities of bgp peering. Specified for microsoft peering

advertisedPublicPrefixesState.description: AdvertisedPublicPrefixState of the Peering resource. Possible values are 'NotConfigured', 'Configuring', 'Configured', and 'ValidationNeeded'.

legacyMode.description: The legacy mode of the peering.

routeFilter.description: The reference of the RouteFilter resource.

state.description: The state of peering. Possible values are: 'Disabled' and 'Enabled'

ExpressRouteCircuitStats.description: Contains stats associated with the peering.

peeringType.description: The PeeringType. Possible values are: 'AzurePublicPeering', 'AzurePrivatePeering', and 'MicrosoftPeering'.

state.description: The state of peering. Possible values are: 'Disabled' and 'Enabled'

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

lastModifiedBy.description: Gets whether the provider or the customer last modified the peering.

routeFilter.description: The reference of the RouteFilter resource.

name.description: Gets name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

value.description: The peerings in an express route circuit.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ExpressRouteCircuitPeeringListResult.description: Response for ListPeering API service call retrieves all peerings that belong to an ExpressRouteCircuit.

tier.description: The tier of the SKU. Possible values are 'Standard' and 'Premium'.

family.description: The family of the SKU. Possible values are: 'UnlimitedData' and 'MeteredData'.

circuitProvisioningState.description: The CircuitProvisioningState state of the resource.

serviceProviderProvisioningState.description: The ServiceProviderProvisioningState state of the resource. Possible values are 'NotProvisioned', 'Provisioning', 'Provisioned', and 'Deprovisioning'.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ExpressRouteCircuitArpTable.description: The ARP table associated with the ExpressRouteCircuit.

value.description: Gets list of the ARP table.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ExpressRouteCircuitsArpTableListResult.description: Response for ListArpTable associated with the Express Route Circuits API.

ExpressRouteCircuitRoutesTable.description: The routes table associated with the ExpressRouteCircuit

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ExpressRouteCircuitsRoutesTableListResul.description: Response for ListRoutesTable associated with the Express Route Circuits API.

v.description: BGP version number spoken to the neighbor.

upDown.description: The length of time that the BGP session has been in the Established state, or the current status if not in the Established state.

statePfxRcd.description: Current state of the BGP session, and the number of prefixes that have been received from a neighbor or peer group.

ExpressRouteCircuitRoutesTableSummary.description: The routes table associated with the ExpressRouteCircuit.

value.description: A list of the routes table.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ExpressRouteCircuitsRoutesTableSummaryLi.description: Response for ListRoutesTable associated with the Express Route Circuits API.

value.description: A list of ExpressRouteCircuits in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ExpressRouteCircuitListResult.description: Response for ListExpressRouteCircuit API service call.

ExpressRouteServiceProviderBandwidthsOff.description: Contains bandwidths offered in ExpressRouteServiceProvider resources.

peeringLocations.description: Get a list of peering locations.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the resource.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ExpressRouteServiceProviderListResult.description: Response for the ListExpressRouteServiceProvider API service call.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
